name: Power of Shattering Stone
description:
Each stack increases the ATK of the character to which this is attached by 1.
After the character to which this is attached acts: Take 1 Piercing DMG for every stack.
descriptionraw: Each stack increases the ATK of the character to which this is attached by 1.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>After the character to which this is attached acts:</color> Take 1 $[K5] for every stack.
descriptionreplaced: Each stack increases the ATK of the character to which this is attached by 1.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>After the character to which this is attached acts:</color> Take 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Piercing DMG</color> for every stack.
